{ "rules": { "unknown-error-format":{ "description": "Every error response SHOULD support either RFC 7807 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6648) or the JSON:API Error format.", "formats": ["oas3"], "severity": "warn" "given": "$.paths.[*].responses[?(@property.match(/^(4|5)/))].content.*~", "then": {"function":"enumeration","functionOptions":null,"values":["application/vnd.api+json","application/problem+xml","application/problem+json"]} } } }
